latestSupportedKubernetesVersion.description: The highest PATCH Kubernetes version for the highest MINOR version supported by ManagedCluster resource

latestStableKubernetesVersion.description: The highest PATCH Kubernetes version for the MINOR version considered stable for the ManagedCluster resource

lowestMinorKubernetesVersion.description: The highest PATCH Kubernetes version for the lowest applicable MINOR version available for the ManagedCluster resource

latestPreviewKubernetesVersion.description: The highest PATCH Kubernetes version considered preview for the ManagedCluster resource. There might not be any version in preview at the time of publishing the event

ContainerServiceNewKubernetesVersionAvai.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ContainerService.NewKubernetesVersionAvailable event
Properties of an event published to an Event Grid topic using a custom schema

id.description: An unique identifier for the event.

topic.description: The resource path of the event source.

subject.description: A resource path relative to the topic path.

data.description: Event data specific to the event type.

eventType.description: The type of the event that occurred.

eventTime.description: The time (in UTC) the event was generated.

metadataVersion.description: The schema version of the event metadata.

dataVersion.description: The schema version of the data object.

ContainerServiceNewKubernetesVersionAvai.description: Properties of an event published to an Event Grid topic using the EventGrid Schema.
